nodes.text: The Chanzari Den was a Selonian den native to Selonia who was allied with the Hunchuzuc Den and the Republicanists. When Han Solo, Dracmus and Salculd crashed their Coneship, they were fortunate enough to land on a Chanzari-controlled land. Like the Hunchuzuc, they were most likely tricked into submission by the Overden and the Sacorrian Triad, who had lied about who had true control over Selonia's planetary repulsor.
